definition: any igniter that is used to initiate the burning of a propellant
details:
noun
- any igniter that is used to initiate the burning of a propellant
= synonyms: primer, fuze, fusee, fuzee, fuse
- the act of making something ready
- the first or preliminary coat of paint or size applied to a surface
= synonyms: undercoat, flat coat, ground, primer, primer coat, priming coat
